text: Amanda MacKinnon Gaiman Palmer (born April 30, 1976), sometimes known as Amanda Palmer, is an American musician. She became famous for being the singer of The Dresden Dolls. In 2008 her first solo album Who Killed Amanda Palmer was released by Roadrunner. Her second album Theatre Is Evil was released in 2012. Palmer was born in New York City. She grew up in Lexington, Massachusetts.'Who Killed Amanda Palmer' is a haunting, intimate solo debut - The Boston Globe At a Halloween party in 2000, Palmer met drummer Brian Viglione. Afterwards Palmer and Viglione started The Dresden Dolls. Palmer has been married to English writer Neil Gaiman since 2011. ==References== ==Other websites== * Amanda Palmer's official site Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:Singers from New York City Category:Singers from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:American bloggers
title: Amanda Palmer
